description:
Saves a file to a folder in Google Drive.
The folder should be shared to with `data-flo@data-flo.iam.gserviceaccount.com` and given `can edit` permission.

input.name: file url
input.description: The URL of an existing file on Google Drive to be updated. Leave empty to create a new file.

input.name: folder
input.description: The URL of the folder on Google Drive. Leave empty if updating a file.

output.name: url
output.description: The Google Drive URL of the created file.

output.name: id
output.description: The ID of the created file.
